> _**New chromas**_ are launching every month, and _**they**_’ll be eligible for an IP sale after being out for more than five months. 

It literally says the new chromas will be for sale.


However, the [BR news](http://br.leagueoflegends.com/pt/news/store/sales/promocao-de-cromas-por-ip-de-23/03/17-06/04/17) has an extra sentence that isn't here in this news: 
> After the first IP sale, Chromas will be back on intermittent sales (meaning, Chromas from last year sale will be back after that year)

I VERY rarely comment but I just want to post to say that I think that the communication was quite terrible regarding which chromas would be available.  In fact, in a recent survey that I completed for RIOT, I noted that the best part about the chromas was that they would all be available for IP save for new ones.  Unfortunately, it seems that I was wrong.  For those that are chiding others for being upset, I would urge you to see another point of view.  Waiting a year between opportunities to purchase a specific chroma for IP is quite frustrating.  Saying "every other IP sale" certainly sounds better than saying "once per year."  IP chroma sales may be bi-annual but specific IP chromas are certainly annual sales.  Seems to be a waste.

In fact, the FAQ makes this more confusing and completely contradictory: 

HOW DO I BUY CHROMAS FOR IP?
You can purchase chromas for IP during special chroma IP sales that take place twice a year. During these promotion periods, you can purchase a chroma for 2000 IP.
